timeline.message:
Testing changes to fix Jenkins name resolution problem.

Signed-off-by: Raúl Gracia <raul.gracia@emc.com>

Fix checkstyle.

Signed-off-by: Raúl Gracia <raul.gracia@emc.com>

Try using loopback address.

Signed-off-by: Raúl Gracia <raul.gracia@emc.com>

Use InetAddress to set Bookie advertised address.

Signed-off-by: Raúl Gracia <raul.gracia@emc.com>

Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/pravega/pravega into upstream-master

Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/pravega/pravega into upstream-master
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/pravega/pravega into upstream-master

Fix `getOrSet` prematurely closing a valid Meter.

Signed-off-by: co-jo <colin.hryniowski@dell.com>

Add back comment.

Signed-off-by: co-jo <colin.hryniowski@dell.com>

Make `getOrSet` atomic.
Add exception to concurrent closure of a proxy.

Signed-off-by: co-jo <colin.hryniowski@dell.com>

Remove concatenated string.

Signed-off-by: co-jo <colin.hryniowski@dell.com>

timeline.bodyText: The expected argument has been changed because before the expectation that was we would still create the Metric and add it to the metrics array, but just immediately mark it as closed. Now we just avoid that creation step completely (if it exists).
timeline.author: co-jo
